data.title: Sacred Heart Seminary, Nsude
data.description: Sacred Heart Seminary, Nsude has been enrolled in our foreign language learning program since 2024. With 450 students across various grades, the school provides daily English, French, and German instruction integrated into the curriculum. The program has shown a 78% improvement in student language comprehension and communication skills.

data.title: Divine Love Secondary School, Dhamija
data.description: Divine Love Secondary School, Dhamija participates in our comprehensive language program serving 320 students in various grades. The curriculum includes Spanish, German, French, and advanced English courses. Students have achieved an average 85% pass rate in international language proficiency examinations.

data.title: Notre Dame Academy, Enugu
data.description: Notre Dame Academy, Enugu is a premier institution with 580 students enrolled in our multi-language program. Featuring Mandarin Chinese, Japanese, French, Spanish, and Portuguese courses alongside traditional European languages. The school has partnered with 5 international universities for student exchange programs.

data.title: St Paul's Group of Schools, Awkunanaw Enugu
data.description: St Paul's Group of Schools, Awkunanaw Enugu serves 275 students with structured language education programs. Offering French, Spanish, German, and Chinese instruction with certified language instructors. The school has established partnerships with native speaker communities for cultural exchange activities. Currently on pause for program restructuring.

data.title: Marvelous Grace High School, Enugu
data.description: Marvelous Grace High School, Enugu is dedicated to developing multilingual learners with 420 students in our program. Specializing in Mandarin Chinese, Arabic, French, Spanish, and English language development. The school has trained 12 language teachers and maintains immersive learning environments. Currently inactive pending resource allocation.

data.title: Queen's Model Comprehensive College, Gariki
data.description: Queen's Model Comprehensive College, Gariki has enrolled 190 students in our comprehensive language programs. The center features modern language labs, interactive digital learning tools, and monthly language competitions. Offering French, German, Spanish, and Japanese instruction. Students have won 3 regional language proficiency awards.
